content: I've been taking online courses in data analytics and digital marketing to improve my skills and stay competitive in the industry, so some of these resources might be familiar to me. By the way, earlier this month, I had a performance review with Rachel, and we discussed my career development plan, including my goal to take on more leadership roles in the company and increase my visibility within the organization. Do you think any of these resources could help me with that, maybe some leadership or management courses?
